Summary: I was at a 4 way stop, turning north, when I seen a lightning flash, and when I looked at. Flash object was observed
divs: Sighting DetailsMy Name is Jose Morales,, in the last ten minutes, as I was driving through a back road to get to our Vineyard. I seen a lightning flash, that flash revealed a huge Orange Disc object. It was very large, Football field length, and a little narrow in the front end. It had what looked like a blue vein circulating through it. It's a full moon, and very clear night. Very interesting.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Lodi
There were no other sightings in Lodi on or around August 29th 2012
